InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: StrikeForce II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The StrikeForce is the latest culmination of Thermyte Concern's expansion into the missile industry, showcasing notable design and cross-section targeting improvements.

Grade: C

Based on Gotlieb Yorm’s original design, the Targa is a light, high performance, competition-grade generator that revolutionized racing.

InstalledItem.Name: LumaCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Competition

Among small power plants, ACOM’s LumaCore consistently ranks among the best for its power rate, cool rate, and high overheat temperature. That’s why if you value your ship’s performance over anything else, this competition-grade component is perfect for you.

InstalledItem.Name: QuikCool
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Competition

The QuikCool provides superior performance over other coolers in its class. This competition grade component from ACOM sacrifices stealth and some durability to be one of the most powerful entry-level coolers around.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

Increased power and performance makes the SNS-R6 stand out from other radars in its class. Get yours today to see why pilots the Empire over love components from Nav-E7 Gadgets.
